wordGroup: infinitely great 无穷大，无限大
infinitely small 无穷小的，无限小

sentences.cn: 人类的适应力是无限的。

sentences.en: A centimetre can be infinitely divided into smaller units.
sentences.cn: 一厘米能被无穷尽地分为更小的单位。

sentences.en: We realize that we are infinitely small within the scheme of things.
sentences.cn: 我们认识到在大千世界中我们是极其渺小的。
